alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Magoffin; Martin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:16PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Martin, east central Morgan, Johnson and northeastern Magoffin Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 116 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Flatgap, or 7 miles northwest of Paintsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winifred and Staffordsville around 120 PM EDT. Paintsville, Sip, Kerz, Chandlerville, Galen, Stambaugh, Wittensville and Thealka around 125 PM EDT. Nippa, Tutor Key, Bobbs and Thelma around 130 PM EDT. River, Offutt, Boons Camp, Wells Chapel and Williamsport around 135 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Chestnut, Whitehouse, Inez, Wells, Milo, Stidham, Add, Tomahawk and Job. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
